attributes.action: Do not close Acorn House - vital respite facility in Dumfries and Galloway.
attributes.additional_details: Scottish Government pushing Self Directed Support - which for many families is unsuitable.
attributes.background: Acorn House run in partnership by D and G council and NHS. A vital respite facility for children with severe and complex learning difficulties. Currently ‘under review’ but parents concerned by what is thought to be a ‘done deal’ it is outlined for closure.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
